021import net.tnemc.core.TNECore;
022import net.tnemc.core.account.Account;
023import net.tnemc.core.account.AccountStatus;
024import net.tnemc.core.actions.EconomyResponse;
025import net.tnemc.core.api.response.AccountAPIResponse;
026import net.tnemc.core.manager.TransactionManager;
027import net.tnemc.core.transaction.Receipt;
028import net.tnemc.core.utils.Extractor;
029import net.tnemc.plugincore.PluginCore;
030import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.compatibility.CmdSource;
031import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.compatibility.log.DebugLevel;
032import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.compatibility.scheduler.ChoreExecution;
033import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.compatibility.scheduler.ChoreTime;
034import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.io.message.MessageData;
035import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.io.storage.StorageManager;
036
037import java.util.Optional;
038
039/**
040 * AdminCommand
041 *
042 * @author creatorfromhell
043 * @since 0.1.2.0
044 */
045public class AdminCommand extends BaseCommand {
046
047  public static void onMyEco(final CmdSource<?> sender) {
048
049    if(sender.player().isPresent()) {
050
051      sender.player().get().inventory().openMenu(sender.player().get(), "my_eco");
052    }
053  }
054
055  public static void onBackup(final CmdSource<?> sender) {
056
057    if(StorageManager.instance().backup()) {
058
059      sender.message(new MessageData("Messages.Data.Backup"));
060      return;
061    }
062    sender.message(new MessageData("Messages.Data.BackupFailed"));
063  }
064
065  //<player> [balance]
066  public static void onCreate(final CmdSource<?> sender, final String name) {
067
068    if(TNECore.eco().account().findAccount(name).isPresent()) {
069
070      //Our account already exists, so we can't make it.
071      final MessageData data = new MessageData("Messages.Admin.Exists");
072      data.addReplacement("$name", name);
073      sender.message(data);
074      return;
075    }
076
077    final AccountAPIResponse response = TNECore.eco().account().createAccount(name);
078    if(response.getResponse().success()) {
079      final MessageData data = new MessageData("Messages.Admin.Created");
080      data.addReplacement("$name", name);
081      sender.message(data);
082      return;
083    }
084    final MessageData data = new MessageData("Messages.Admin.CreationFailed");
085    data.addReplacement("$name", name);
086    sender.message(data);
087  }
088
089  //<standard/detailed/developer>
090  public static void onDebug(final CmdSource<?> sender, final DebugLevel level) {
091
092    PluginCore.instance().setLevel(level);
093    final MessageData data = new MessageData("Messages.Data.Debug");
094    data.addReplacement("$level", level.name());
095    sender.message(data);
096  }
097
098  public static void onDelete(final CmdSource<?> sender, final String name) {
099
100    final Optional<Account> acc = TNECore.eco().account().findAccount(name);
101    if(acc.isEmpty()) {
102
103      //Our account doesn't exist, so we can't delete it.
104      final MessageData data = new MessageData("Messages.Admin.NoAccount");
105      data.addReplacement("$name", name);
106      sender.message(data);
107      return;
108    }
109
110    final EconomyResponse response = TNECore.eco().account().deleteAccount(acc.get().getIdentifier());
111    if(response.success()) {
112
113      //deleted
114      final MessageData data = new MessageData("Messages.Admin.Deleted");
115      data.addReplacement("$name", name);
116      sender.message(data);
117      return;
118    }
119
120    //failed deletion
121    final MessageData data = new MessageData("Messages.Admin.DeletionFailed");
122    data.addReplacement("$name", name);
123    sender.message(data);
124  }
125
126  public static void onExtract(final CmdSource<?> sender) {
127
128
129    PluginCore.server().scheduler().createDelayedTask(Extractor::extract, new ChoreTime(0), ChoreExecution.SECONDARY);
130    sender.message(new MessageData("Messages.Admin.Extraction"));
131  }
132
133  public static void onPurge(final CmdSource<?> sender) {
134
135    TNECore.instance().storage().purge();
136  }
137
138  public static void onReload(final CmdSource<?> sender, final String type) {
139
140    String formattedType = type;
141    switch(type.toLowerCase()) {
142      case "config" -> {
143        TNECore.instance().config().load();
144        TNECore.eco().currency().load(PluginCore.directory());
145      }
146      case "data" -> TNECore.instance().data().load();
147      case "message" -> TNECore.instance().message().load();
148      default -> {
149        TNECore.instance().config().load();
150        TNECore.eco().currency().load(PluginCore.directory());
151        TNECore.instance().data().load();
152        TNECore.instance().storage().loadAll(Account.class, "");
153        TNECore.instance().message().load();
154        formattedType = "all";
155      }
156    }
157
158    final MessageData data = new MessageData("Messages.Admin.Reloaded");
159    data.addReplacement("$type", formattedType);
160    sender.message(data);
161  }
162
163  public static void onReloadDB(final CmdSource<?> sender) {
164
165    TNECore.eco().account().getAccounts().clear();
166    TransactionManager.receipts().getReceipts().clear();
167
168    TNECore.instance().storage().loadAll(Account.class, "");
169    TNECore.instance().storage().loadAll(Receipt.class, "");
170  }
171
172  public static void onReset(final CmdSource<?> sender) {
173
174    StorageManager.instance().reset();
175  }
176
177  public static void onRestore(final CmdSource<?> sender, final int extraction) {
178
179
180    PluginCore.server().scheduler().createDelayedTask(()->Extractor.restore(extraction), new ChoreTime(0), ChoreExecution.SECONDARY);
181    sender.message(new MessageData("Messages.Admin.Restoration"));
182  }
183
184  public static void onSave(final CmdSource<?> sender) {
185
186    StorageManager.instance().storeAll();
187    sender.message(new MessageData("Messages.Data.Save"));
188  }
189
190  //<account> [status]
191  public static void onStatus(final CmdSource<?> sender, final Account account, final AccountStatus status) {
192
193    //Set the account's status to the new one.
194    account.setStatus(status);
195
196    final MessageData data = new MessageData("Messages.Admin.StatusChange");
197    data.addReplacement("$name", account.getName());
198    data.addReplacement("$status", status.identifier());
199    sender.message(data);
200  }
201
202  public static void onVersion(final CmdSource<?> sender) {
203
204    final MessageData data = new MessageData("Messages.General.Version");
205    data.addReplacement("$version", TNECore.version);
206    data.addReplacement("$build", TNECore.build);
207    sender.message(data);
208  }
209}
